IA_NAME_PRESENT: Your name is correctly entered in {cell} on the Income Analysis tab.
IA_NAME_MISSING: Your name is missing from {cell} on the Income Analysis tab. Please enter your name so the assignment can be identified as yours.
IA_SLOPE_MISSING: The slope formula in {cell} appears to be missing or is not entered as a valid SLOPE() function.
IA_SLOPE_CORRECT: Your slope formula in {cell} is correct and uses the proper B19:B26 (y-values) and A19:A26 (x-values) ranges.
IA_SLOPE_REVERSED: Your slope formula in {cell} uses the correct rows but reverses the x- and y-ranges. While this still computes a line, the conventional order is SLOPE(y_range, x_range).
IA_SLOPE_WRONG_RANGE: Your slope formula in {cell} uses SLOPE(), but the ranges are incorrect. It should use B19:B26 for y-values and A19:A26 for x-values.
IA_INTERCEPT_MISSING: The intercept formula in {cell} appears to be missing or is not entered as a valid INTERCEPT() function.
IA_INTERCEPT_CORRECT: Your intercept formula in {cell} is correct and uses the proper B19:B26 (y-values) and A19:A26 (x-values) ranges.
IA_INTERCEPT_REVERSED: Your intercept formula in {cell} uses the correct rows but reverses the x- and y-ranges. This still computes a line, but it is not in the standard order INTERCEPT(y_range, x_range).
IA_INTERCEPT_WRONG_RANGE: Your intercept formula in {cell} uses INTERCEPT(), but the ranges are incorrect. It should use B19:B26 for y-values and A19:A26 for x-values.
IA_SLOPE_FORMAT_CORRECT: The slope value in {cell} is formatted correctly as a number with 0 decimal places.
IA_SLOPE_FORMAT_INCORRECT: The slope value in {cell} is not formatted correctly. It should be displayed as a number with 0 decimal places (for example, 12 or 1,234).
IA_INTERCEPT_FORMAT_CORRECT: The intercept value in {cell} is formatted correctly as a number with 0 decimal places.
IA_INTERCEPT_FORMAT_INCORRECT: The intercept value in {cell} is not formatted correctly. It should be displayed as a number with 0 decimal places.
IA_PREDICTIONS_ALL_CORRECT: All predicted income formulas in {range} are correct and reference the slope (B30), intercept (B31), and years of experience.
IA_PREDICTIONS_NONE_CORRECT: None of the predicted income formulas in {range} match the expected pattern. These cells should use a formula like =B30*D19+B31 that references the slope, intercept, and years.
IA_PREDICTIONS_PARTIAL: {correct} out of {total} predicted income formulas are correct. {issues}
IA_PREDICTIONS_NOT_FORMULAS: {count} cells in {range} do not contain formulas. These should be formulas, not hardcoded values.
IA_PREDICTIONS_MISSING_REFS: {count} formulas in {range} are missing references to {expected}.
IA_PREDICTIONS_MISSING_YEARS: {count} formulas in {range} do not reference the corresponding years of experience cell (D column).
IA_PREDICTIONS_REFS_BUT_WRONG_VALUE: {count} formulas in {range} reference B30/B31 but calculate an incorrect value.
IA_PREDICTIONS_VALUE_BUT_NO_REFS: {count} cells in {range} have the correct value but do not use a formula referencing B30 and B31.
IA_PRED_FORMAT_ALL_CORRECT: All predicted income values in {range} are formatted correctly as currency with 0 decimal places.
IA_PRED_FORMAT_NONE_CORRECT: None of the predicted income values in {range} are formatted correctly. These cells should be formatted as currency with 0 decimal places.
IA_PRED_FORMAT_PARTIAL: {correct} out of {total} predicted income values are formatted correctly as currency with 0 decimal places.
IA_SCATTER_NOT_CHECKED: The scatterplot portion of the Income Analysis tab is not automatically graded and will be reviewed manually.
IA_SCATTER_NOT_FOUND: No XY scatter chart was found on the Income Analysis tab. Please create an XY scatter chart using the BLS income data.
IA_SCATTER_FOUND: Your XY scatter chart is present and uses the correct chart type.
IA_SCATTER_TITLE_MISSING: Your chart is missing a title. Please add an appropriate title describing the data.
IA_SCATTER_XLABEL_PRESENT: Your chart has an X-axis label: "{label}"
IA_SCATTER_XLABEL_MISSING: Your chart is missing an X-axis label. Please add a label describing what the X-axis represents (e.g., Years of Experience).
IA_SCATTER_YLABEL_PRESENT: Your chart has a Y-axis label: "{label}"
IA_SCATTER_YLABEL_MISSING: Your chart is missing a Y-axis label. Please add a label describing what the Y-axis represents (e.g., Income).
IA_SCATTER_TRENDLINE_PRESENT: Your chart has a trendline showing the linear relationship.
IA_SCATTER_TRENDLINE_MISSING: Your chart is missing a trendline. Please add a linear trendline to show the relationship between the variables.
IA_SCATTER_EXTENDED_CORRECT: Your trendline is properly extended to show predictions beyond the original data range.
IA_SCATTER_EXTENDED_MISSING: Your trendline should be extended to show predictions from {expected_min} to {expected_max} years. Please extend the axis or trendline to show this range.
